item.title: About
item.description: I’m Erfan, a software developer from Tehran, Iran. I work as a back-end developer at FullFekr and also as a software developer at Okkur Labs. You can find me on social networks by searching for @erbesharat. I’m mostly active on Twitter and you can read my English tweets on @erbesharat_en I’v done some open source projects, you can find them on my Github profile. Github Twitter (Persian) Twitter (English)

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hi! I’m Erfan, a software developer who loves sharing his knowledge and talking about challenges in his work. I write mostly about back-end development and Golang because It’s what I do everyday at work. I also write about my challenges in other fields like front-end or DevOps. You can find the links to my social media accounts on About page.
